channel.title: probability and statistics on 课程信息

item.title: 概率统计A (B)
item.description: 平时作业：每周课后交上一周作业，由学委与助教联系收发作业. 考核方式：闭卷考试90%（改为开卷），平时作业10% 第一部分: 概率论 Sec.1.1, Sec.1.2, Sec.1.3 Sec.1.4, Sec.1.5 Sec.1.6, Sec.2.1 Sec.2.2, Sec.2.3 Sec.2.4, Sec.2.5 Sec.3.1, Sec.3.2, Sec.3.3 Sec.3.4, Sec.3.5, Sec.4.1 Sec.4.2, Sec.4.3, Sec.4.4 Sec.5.1, Sec.5.2, Sec.5.3 Sec.5.4, Sec.5.5, Sec.5.6, Sec.6.1, Sec.6.2, Sec.7.1 第二部分: 数理统计 Sec.7.2, Sec.7.3, Sec.8.1, Sec.8.2, Sec.8.3, Sec.8.4 Sec.9.1, Sec.9.2, Sec.9.3, Sec.10.1, Sec.
